module.comment: This module provides access to the HDMI and Stereo Audio capture settings
This module provides access to the Audio DSP specific functionalities

register.name: demux_section_filter
register.comment: 128 sections, with three entries: value, mode and mask, each one 16 bytes

module.comment: The hardware cursor block generates a small picture to the main mixer block.@n An arbitrary bitmap is stored in 4 bit/pixel format in a 512x32 on-chip SRAM. Thus no external memory bandwidth is required to support the cursor.@n On chips earlier than SMP8634, each 4-bit pixel is fed to a 16x6x4 lookup table to produce an output stream of 24-bit (6-6-6-6 format) aYcbCr pixels.@note Each video component is multiplied by four, and the akpha value is extended to 8 bits before being sent to the main mixer.@n On SMP8634 and later chips, each 4-bit pixel is fed to a 16x32 look-up table which outputs 32 bit 8888 aYCbCr pixels.@n The horizontal and vertical dimensions of the cursor picture is constrained as follows: @li X size less than or equal to 255 @li Y size less than or equal to 255
Constraints an HD source by filtering it
Converts a HD content to a SD content
